story_teamplasma_02_11000/2401_1101_0100: A few days after the incident with Team Plasma...
story_teamplasma_02_11000/2401_1001_0200:
Have you seen anyone from Team Plasma
since then?
story_teamplasma_02_11000/2401_1001_0400: I’m happy to see they’ve stopped causing trouble...
story_teamplasma_02_11000/2401_1001_0500:
But I can’t help worrying they might be planning
things behind the scenes.
story_teamplasma_02_11000/2401_1001_0600:
Hopefully this is the last time an incident like
this happens.
story_teamplasma_02_11000/2401_1001_0700: Come on! There’s no need to fret!
story_teamplasma_02_11000/2401_1001_0800:
With everyone together, we should be able to fix
anything they do in a snap!
story_teamplasma_02_11000/2401_1001_0900: Don’t act like you weren’t involved...
story_teamplasma_02_11000/2401_1001_1000:
The key to victory, of course, is the strength
of bonds!
story_teamplasma_02_11000/2401_1001_1100:
N managed to make Genesect our ally by showing
it his devotion.
story_teamplasma_02_11000/2401_1001_1200:
And he was also able to change Hugh’s mind and
establish a relationship of trust!
story_teamplasma_02_11000/2401_1001_1300: In addition, Hilda and Victini’s bond...
story_teamplasma_02_11000/2401_1001_1400:
gave courage and strength to the friends that
were with them!
story_teamplasma_02_11000/2401_1001_1500:
Hilbert and the injured Genesect were also able to
understand each other, and now they’re partners!
story_teamplasma_02_11000/2401_1001_1700:
Yep... He seems to get very passionate when he
talks about his research.
story_teamplasma_02_11000/2401_1001_1900: N! Hilbert! We were waiting for you two!
story_teamplasma_02_11000/2401_1001_2300: We’ve been waiting for so long to battle you!
story_teamplasma_02_11000/2401_1001_2400: I would love to see everyone’s battle again!
story_teamplasma_02_11000/2401_1001_2500: Now then. Show me the power of your bonds!
story_teamplasma_02_11000/2401_1001_2600:
With all this excitement, I suppose I won’t have
much time to dwell on the past.
story_teamplasma_02_11000/2401_1001_2700: Yeah! Let’s move forward together, N!
